sentences.sContent: Though modesty be a virtue , yet bashfulness is a vice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Though modesty be a virtue , yet bashfulness is a vice.
sentences.sCn: 尽管谦虚是一种美德，但害羞就成了缺点。

sentences.sContent: It probably reflects either male boasting or female bashfulness, but though it affects totals it does not seem to affect trends.
sentences.sContent_eng: It probably reflects either male boasting or female bashfulness, but though it affects totals it does not seem to affect trends.
sentences.sCn: 这可能反映了男性的自夸或者是女性羞赧，虽然它影响到了总数但是似乎没有影响到趋势。

remMethod.val: 来自bashful(adj. 羞怯的， 忸怩的)

words.tran: 羞怯地；易窘迫地；局促不安地
